document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Gyllenhal, L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Gyllenhal, L. (1837) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J., Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyllenhal, C. H. Boheman, et entomologis aliis illustratae. Vol. 4 (1). Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, pp. IV + 1 - 600.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Kazakhstan , Siberia, Russian Far East; introduced in North America ( Colonnelli 2013 ).
